Kontak Cari

 {{ item.isFav ? 'Unfavorite' : 'Favorite' }} Hapus import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { Icontact } from '../interfaces/icontact'; import { DbcontactService } from '../services/dbcontact.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-tab2', templateUrl: 'tab2.page.html', styleUrls: ['tab2.page.scss'] }) export class Tab2Page { constructor( public router: Router, public db: DbcontactService, ) { } tambah() { this.router.navigateByUrl('add') } favorite(item: Icontact) { this.db.favorite(item.id) } delete(item: Icontact) { this.db.delete(item.id) } }
